product_name: Amphipod Hydraform In-Touch Handheld Bottle with Phone Pouch - 16 fl. oz.
long_description: The Amphipod Hydraform In-Touch Handheld Bottle with Phone Pouch offers all the benefits of the classic Hydraform Handheld with low-profile, clear, touch access to iPhone 4, 5 or similar-size phones.
short_description: The Amphipod Hydraform In-Touch Handheld Bottle with Phone Pouch offers all the benefits of the classic Hydraform Handheld with low-profile, clear, touch access to iPhone 4, 5 or similar-size phones.
